titles.title: A joint resolution relating to the City of Pueblo, Colorado.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Recognizes William J. Crawford, Carl L. Sitter, Raymond G. Murphy, and Drew Dennis Dix for being recipients of the medal of honor. Congratulates Pueblo on being the home of those four recipients of the medal and recognizes the city as the "Home of Heroes."
